name: Pension Aviano

reviews.title: Good location, family run hotel
reviews.text: We really liked this hotel. It has the feel of a family run hotel. Our room was very charming with a white wardrobe and headboard. The light was a small chandelier. The room was a good size. The bathroom was adequate and had a nice strong shower with hot water. We were there in mid June and the weather was a bit chilly and rainy. That worked in our favor because there is no air conditioning. A week later, Europe was having a heat wave and I think that our room would have been very hot. Because we slept with the windows open, it was quite noisy. I used ear plugs but my husband did not and heard the noise from the street. The breakfast buffet had scrambled eggs, fresh fruit and fruit salad ( sometimes fresh and sometimes with added canned fruit cocktail), pastries, and cereals. The morning we were leaving we tried to get a taxi to take us to the train. We were assured there were always taxis available. There were none that morning. But they called a cab for us and there was one there in a matter of minutes.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived by train,had no trouble finding the hotel via subway.
reviews.title: Great location but-----.........

reviews.text: Staff very polite, friendly and helpful. We chose a room on the back of the building, fearing the noise level on the front would disturb our sleep. Yes, the rooms on the back are quiet, but have absolutely ZERO view. The room was adequate in size and clean. The bathroom, shower only, very small and little room to place toiletries. The location, only minutes away from St. Stephen's and the old city is superb. The hotel, however, has deficiencies.
reviews.title: A lovely retreat in the heart of Vienna

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One: The breakfast bar is very small and tight. There is no place to put a plate or cup on the counter to fill with cereal etc.
reviews.title: Nice B&B, Great Location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room itself, though cozy perhaps, is also very small and
reviews.title: Great place in Vienna: superb location, friendly staff and thoughtful touches

reviews.text: I just returned home from another fabulous trip Vienna. I stayed at the Pension Aviano AGAIN.... in fact, this was my 7th stay over the last 10 years. How do I know? They had it in the computer and acknowledged me as a return guest with a bottle of wine and an upgraded room. My sister and I stated in room 413 and it was PERFECT. The room was spacious and very clean. We used both the bed and the pull-out sofa bed. They were both very comfortable. Along with the sofa, we also had 2 nice chairs to sit in while watching TV (table, too). There were also 2 chairs and a small table in front of the window so we could enjoy watching the people walk along Kartnerstrasse.
reviews.title: Doesn't Get Any Better..... Pension Aviano

reviews.text: The hotel is located on Marco d'Avianogasse. Walking from the Opera house towards the center of town, it's about the 3rd side street on the left. There is a Douglas drug store and a Swarvoski store on the corners where you turn left - also a flower stand. Turn left and go past the flower stand and wine bar... the entrance is just to the right of the wine bar. Take the lift (or stairs if you dare) to the 6th floor. You will receive a friendly greeting and a smile!
reviews.title: Perfect stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at 9:30 AM and our room was not available yet (and we did not expect it to be). However, they allowed us to change our clothes/freshen up and leave our luggage. We came back around 11:00 AM and our room was available at about 11:30. Check in is not until around 2:00 PM so we were very pleased to get into our room by noon.
reviews.title: Great location, right in the middle of Vienna!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A few things to remember.... this is a PENSION, not a hotel. Make sure you know the difference and set your expectations accordingly. The building is old and is not air conditioned. Many older buildings do not have AC. You can open the windows - expect some street noise (bring earplugs). Breakfast is amazing. It's not an 'American-Style' buffet so do not expect to have pancakes and sausage. There is a great selection of cereal, cheese, meat, bread, milk and juice. They offer coffee and tea at breakfast and in the afternoon between 2 PM and 8 PM.
reviews.title: Location Location Location - and nice staff!

reviews.text: I LOVE the Pension Aviano and will stay there every time I go to Vienna. The family who owns the Pension is wonderful - everyone is nice, friendly and VERY helpful. If you need something, ask nicely..... they will do their best to accommodate.
reviews.title: Small things are great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location for all main tourist, shopping and restaurants. Nothing was too much trouble for staff. suitable for all ages.
reviews.title: Location!

reviews.text: Nice little place in the central part of Vienna, close to everything. Nice breakfast and good standard in the rooms, high value for money.
reviews.title: Will come back for sure...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Situation : in the city center, really close to Stephanplatz (5 min walk), the Oper (5 min walk) and one of the main shopping street (Kamtner Strasse)... close to museums (Albertina, Hofburg,...) without taking any transports...
reviews.title: Excellent location and good value for money

reviews.text: Maybe a bit difficult to find it... but only for those who haven't look the pictures of the entrance... The elevator might be slow, but ok...
reviews.title: Good experience.Cozy,central and clean.Simple ,yet provides all a traveller needs.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our 4 night stay at Pension Aviano was perfect. Location absolutely central and our room quiet as per our request. Our room was a taste of Viennese style - delightful,spacious,comfortable and clean. The very helpful staff couldn't do enough for you - excellent in all aspects. Breakfast was fresh and delicious with a variety of foods. We loved eating our breakfast on the balcony adjoining the breakfast room - the pansy balcony boxes a lovely touch.The superb location to Hofburg Imperial Apartments, the Treasury, the Spanish Riding School and the Opera made sightseeing a breeze.
reviews.title: Truely Scrumptious!

reviews.text: My sister and I stayed here for 2 nights after a river cruise. We were in the top floor corner room which is very large. There are 3 windows overlooking the Kartnerstrasse which is great to be able to see St Stephens and what may be happening down on the street. Although it can be quite noisy at night with people out and about. One night the noise lasted until 5am. We had the windows closed also. There are about 7 steps up from the footpath to the very slow lift which takes you to the top floor where the reception is. Aviano is in a nice area where you pass a fruit stand, florist and a large Swarovski store. You can walk to nearly everything of interest. There is an ATM in the small street behind the building. The staff are friendly and helpful. The beds were a little uncomfortable. Bathroom was very clean. Overall, Aviano is a pleasant pension to stay at.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: Incredibly attentive staff and a warm welcome complimented with an amazing breakfast, clean, spacious and homey rooms. Wonderful showers, cozy duvets, fans to cool you off when it is hot and a fabulous location.
reviews.title: Great service, location, and atmosphere.

reviews.text: My Mother and I stayed here from 2nd July to 6th July 2012.
reviews.title: A little bit of paradise.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had booked a taxi from the airport and the driver knew exactly where to take us, which was great as apparently some drivers don't!
reviews.title: The lodging highlight of our trip

description: Aviano is situated in an old Patricianhouse directly in the citycenter on a small sidestreet of Kärntnerstreet. All 17 rooms are in viennese style with shower, Wc, Makeup mirror, TV, telephone, minibar, in room safe. There are no restaurants or bars in the guest house in order to protect the privacy of the guests. We guarantee herewith the much appreciated relaxation of our guests.
